name: Usable Youtube
description: Centers the layout, removes the comments, forces the player size to 720p and moves the related videos under the player. Also changes some fonts. Inspired by Youtube watch page uncluttered and Clean youtube watch page
additional_info: No longer maintained as of 09/2014, since I watch youtube using mpv. Feel free to fix this if you want to, although I recommend you to use this instead. 06/07/2014 - layout fixes 18/02/2014 - related videos fix 17/02/2014 - HTML5 player size fix 30/09/2013 - playlists fix
